title: (x) Small sans in UCLA Magazine masthead - Whitney {Chris Keegan}
content:
I'm hoping this typeface, scanned from the front matter of a magazine, can be ID'd. Despite its small size, it's amazingly crisp and readable on the page——and that's what attracts me to it.

Any help much appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [magazine3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202090731/http:/typophile.com/files/magazine3.jpg) | 213.39 KB |
author: luvtype

comments.content:
Maybe [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/doradani/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202090731/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/doradani/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/doradani/")  
but if not, Doradani does the same thing.
